Advanced Salvos.descr: Increases the duration of Air/Artillery Strikes.

Advanced Zoom.descr: A Picture-in-Picture long range zoom with 4x magnification.

Anchor Turn.descr: Increases the turning speed of a BattleMech.

Arm Speed.descr: Increases the speed at which a 'Mech can move its arms.

Coolant Reserves.descr: Allows an additional Cool Shot to be brought into the match.

Cooldown.descr: Reduces cooldown duration of all Ballistic, Energy, and Missile weaponry.

Enhanced ECM.descr: Decreases the Max Range at which an ECM-protected 'Mech can be targeted, and decreases the Cooldown Duration required before Stealth Armor can be re-activated.

Enhanced Spotting.descr: Increases the accuracy of Air/Artillery Strikes.

Enhanced UAC/RAC.descr: Reduces Jam Duration for UACs and improves Jam Bar Dissipation Rate for RACs.

Expanded Reserves.descr: Allows an additional Air/Artillery Strike to be carried into battle.

Extended Bombardment.descr: Increases the duration of Air/Artillery Strikes.

Extra UAV.descr: Allows an additional UAV to be carried into battle.

Flamer Ventilation.descr: Increases the rate at which ramped heat dissipates.

Gauss Charge.descr: Increases duration of time a Gauss Rifle charge can be held before it depletes.

Heat Containment.descr: Increases maximum heat threshold before a 'Mech shuts down.

Heat Gen.descr: Reduces heat generated by all Ballistic, Energy, and Missile weaponry.

Heat Shielding.descr: Reduces the amount of heat generated while Jump Jetting.

High Explosive.descr: Increases critical damage if a missile crits.

Hill Climb.descr: Reduces the deceleration rate of slowdown when navigating slopes.

Improved Gyros.descr: Reduces the amount of screen shake when being hit by enemy fire.

Laser Cooldown.descr: Reduces STD and ER Laser weapon cooldown duration.

Laser Heat.descr: Reduces STD and ER Laser heat.

Laser Range.descr: Increases STD and ER Laser range.

Lift Speed.descr: Increases initial boost of a 'Mech's Jump Jets.

Magazine Capacity.descr: Provides extra ammo (per-ton equipped) for Ballistic weapons.

Missile Rack.descr: Provides extra missiles (per-ton equipped) for Missile weapons.

Pulse Laser Cooldown.descr: Reduces Pulse Laser weapon cooldown duration.

Quick Ignition.descr: Speeds up start-up and shut-down sequences.

Radar Deprivation.descr: Reduces the duration of time you remain targeted after breaking the enemy's line of sight.

Range.descr: Increases range of all Ballistic, Energy, and Missile weaponry.

Reinforced Casing.descr: Reduces the chance of critical hits.

Seismic Sensor.descr: Allows detection and identification of enemy 'Mechs via ground vibrations. Must be stationary.

Speed Retention.descr: Maintains 'Mech's speed after being legged. Capped at 50 km/h.

Target Decay.descr: Increases amount of time a 'Mech is trackable when its leaves line of sight.

Target Info Gathering.descr: Decreases the amount of time required for detailed target information.

Target Retention.descr: Allows retention of target information when the enemy moves behind the piloted 'Mech.

Torso Speed.descr: Increases the speed at which a 'Mech can twist its upper torso.

Torso Yaw.descr: Increases the maximum amount a 'Mech can twist its torso.

Turn Rate.descr: Increases the turning speed of a 'Mech.

UAV Range.descr: Permanently increases the range of all UAVs.

Vectoring.descr: Increases forward thrust of a 'Mech's Jump Jets.

Velocity.descr: Increases velocity of all Ballistic, Missile, and PPC weaponry.

Vent Calibration.descr: Increases burn time of a 'Mech's Jump Jets.
